title: Ep160 Horror Homicides
description: This week, the gals get in touch with some early traumas experienced in the form of films. Topics include oozing walls, an omnibus-turned-hearse, and a real-life family of cave-dwelling murderers. Enjoy a fresh glass of  Sans Script Syrah, enable location services on your phone, and tune on for Horror Homicides. For a full list of show sponsors, visit
itunes:summary:
This week, the gals get in touch with some early traumas experienced in the form of films. Topics include oozing walls, an omnibus-turned-hearse, and a real-life family of cave-dwelling murderers. Enjoy a fresh glass of Winc's Sans Script Syrah, enable location services on your phone, and tune on for Horror Homicides.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
